Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scores a last-second goal to rescue a draw for England after two defensive blunders had given Belgium the advantage
England's Kobbie Mainoo had a virtuoso performance in his first England start
England's Jarrod Bowen advanced his claim to be in Gareth Southgate's squad for the European Championship
Pre-Game Insights: England wanted to impose themselves as an attacking force after the frustration of Saturday's 1-0 defeat against Brazil
Gareth Southgate's team conceded two completely avoidable goals due to defensive blunders
Post-Match Reflections: Jude Bellingham said Mainoo played well but 'it's difficult' to comment on his performance due to the pressure
Bellingham also praised the team's fighting spirit and said they should be winning with all the chances they made
Miscellaneous Highlights: England wore nameless shirts in the second half to raise awareness of dementia
Belgium's kit was inspired by the comic book character Tintin
